name: Simply Organic Whole Bay Leaf, 0.14 Ounce Glass Jar, Kosher, Sweet, Earthy Aroma, No ETO, Non GMO
short_description: Bay Leaf - This premium organic bay leaf offers a subtle, earthy aroma that infuses your dishes with a unique, savory flavor, perfect for slow-cooked meals.
Bay Leaf - This premium organic bay leaf offers a subtle, earthy aroma that infuses your dishes with a unique, savory flavor, perfect for slow-cooked meals.
Best uses - Perfect for adding depth to soups, stews, braised meats, and sauces, this aromatic bay leaf enhances your favorite savory dishes with its distinctive herbal essence.
Grown for something greater - Simply Organic works directly with sourcing partners whenever possible, paying fair prices directly to them, without a middleman, to maximize the grower's return.
Organic Bottled Spices - Elevate your dishes with Simply Organic Bottled Spices, where the pure, delicious flavor of our spices and seasonings bring the goodness of organics to everyday meals.
About us - We are Simply Organic. The original, all-organic spice brand that lives up to the promise of our name in all we cultivate and bring to the table.
product_description: Simply Organic Bay Leaf (Laurus nobilis) is the only botanical the FDA recognizes as bay and approves for consumption as a spice. An inferior herb — Umbellularia californica, also known as “California bay” — is sometimes sold as bay. It’s longer, darker leaves make it seem more appealing than true bay, but “California bay” has a harsher, more camphor-like flavor. And, one of its key constituents, umbellulone, can induce headaches. That’s just not cool. We authenticate every shipment of our bay to make sure you’re getting real Laurus nobilis, the only bay suitable for culinary use. Best Uses: Don’t stop at soup and seafood. Infuse its earthy, grounding flavor into your beans, grain dishes, and pasta sauce. Or even a simple pot of rice. Features: - 0.14 oz glass bottle - Hand-select high quality whole dried bay leaf; non-irradiated - USDA organic certified and kosher certified - Botanical name: Laurus nobilis

name: USDA Organic Bay Leaves, Lab Tested for Heavy Metals, Resealable 1oz Pouch, Tej Patta, Hojas de Laurel
short_description: USDA Certified Organic: Our USDA-certified organic bay leaves meet strict purity and quality standards, ensuring they are free from chemicals and naturally flavorful.
Lab-Tested for Purity: Independently tested for heavy metals and ETOs, our bay leaves undergo strict quality screening to ensure safety and freshness.
Rich & Aromatic Flavor: With herbal, floral, and earthy undertones, our bay leaves add depth and fragrance to soups, stews, curries, and more.
Premium Whole Leaves: We select intact, smooth-textured, and vibrant green bay leaves, ensuring optimal flavor and a superior culinary experience.
Versatile & Essential: Ideal for soups, curries, braises, and marinades, these organic bay leaves are a staple in global cuisines, enhancing both savory and slow-cooked dishes.
Freshness-Sealed Pouch: Packed in a 1oz resealable pouch, our opaque packaging protects leaves from heat and light, keeping them aromatic and flavorful.
Responsibly Sourced: Harvested from farms in India that follow sustainable and eco-friendly farming practices, ensuring quality and environmental responsibility.

short_description: Hand-selected from Turkish-grown bay trees for robust flavor
Tea-like flavor and minty aroma
Adds savory flavor to roast chicken and turkey, pot roast, soups and stews
Indispensable to most cuisines, especially French, Mediterranean and Indian
When preparing mashed potatoes, add 2 bay leaves to the cooking water
Remove bay leaves from food when cooking is completed
product_description: McCormick hand-selects its bay leaves from Turkish-grown bay trees, a member of the laurel family. Indispensable to most cuisines, especially French, Mediterranean and Indian, they add robust flavor all kinds of meat and vegetable dishes, soups and sauces. Our Bay Leaves have a tea-like flavor and minty aroma that add depth to slow-cooked dishes. They release their flavor slowly, so add them at the beginning of the cooking time. Just be sure to remove them before serving. Prized for their savory flavor, bay leaves are essential in recipes for roast chicken or turkey, pot roast, soups and stews. They enrich bean dishes, tomato sauces, pickling liquids and marinades. Add bay leaves to the water for boiling potatoes when making mashed potatoes.

name: TAJ Bay Leaves (Tej Patta), 16oz Bulk Pack | Whole Bay Leaf | Indian Origin
short_description: Aromatic Bay Leaves : The bay laurel tree provides a delightful aroma that fills the air. Its leaves are sought after for their distinctive scent, used to enrich countless dishes and teas alike. For centuries, people have been drawn to this fragrant leaf, giving it a place of honor in kitchens around the world.

Dried and Fresh: Fresh or dried, bay leaves from the bay laurel tree are essential for adding an aromatic touch to any dish. Whether using them fresh from the garden or dried for storage, their unique flavor is sure to elevate any meal.
Natural: Our bay leaves are of the highest quality and all-natural. Add a few to your meal for an unforgettable flavor!

Versatile: Not only are bay leaves a tasty addition to your culinary creations, they can also be used to help create an enjoyable spa experience. Try adding a few to your bath water to relax and provide a pleasant, earthy scent. Or put them to use in DIY projects such as soaps, candles or even sachets filled with aromatic herbs. Bay leaves offer a plethora of possibilities!

Usage: From soups and stews, to risottos and pasta sauce, the bay laurel leaf adds a unique flavor to any dish. Its aromatic qualities bring out the best in soups, braises, and even the most basic of pots of rice. Toss just a few leaves into your meal for a flavorful experience like no other!
product_description: TAJ Gourmet Foods provides the best of quality. We stand behind our product when it comes to quality and satisfaction. Premium Quality - All Natural, No preservatives Commonly used in cooking for their distinctive flavor and fragrance.
